name: Knowledge Hub
short_description:
A collection of open source portlets developed by PFI Knowledge Solutions in conjunction with Liberata for the Local Government Association to help UK Local Authorities innovate and improve together.

JSR-286 Portlets for use in conjunction with Intelligus delivering:
•	Calendar Events
•	Chat
•	Advanced Search
•	Blogs aggregator
•	Front Page Content
•	Group Members
•	Group Members Tag Cloud
•	Groups (contains 20 group-based portlets)
•	Group Library
•	Ideas Factory
•	My Connections
•	My Content
•	User Profile
•	Workspace Info
•	Microblogging
•	Social (contains 16 people/social portlets)
